subject: Read existing node code to understand patterns
description:
Read existing node code to understand patterns. Key findings:

- Category config pattern: `old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/caller-category-config.js:8` - `return [{ json: { category_key: "caller", schema: {...}, system_rules: "...", microprompts: [...] } }]`
- Input validator: `old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/input-validator.js:9` - `const VALID_CATEGORIES = ["caller", "contact", "routing", ...]`
- Category merger schema merge: `old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/category-merger.js:1295` - `function mergeSchemas(categoryKeys, customCategories = {})`
- Category merger prompt merge: `old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/category-merger.js:1350` - `function mergePrompts(categoryKeys, inputData, ...)`
- Output assembler: `old/temp_nodes_v56_cleanup/n8n-nodes/output-assembler.js:262` - iterates categories, extracts `{value, rationale}`
- Testable validator at: `tests/code-nodes/llm-data-extraction/input-validator/input-validator.js:23` - `function validateInput(input)`
- Vitest config: `vitest.config.ts:7` - `include: ["tests/**/*.test.{ts,js}"]`

Verification: Read all files via Read tool, confirmed patterns via Grep for function signatures.
